name: DCH Delivery Place Type
description: A CodeSystem to identify the type of location in which the baby was born.

concept.display: In NHS hospital - delivery facilities associated with midwife ward
In NHS hospital - delivery facilities associated with consultant ward
In NHS hospital - delivery facilities associated with GMP ward
In NHS hospital - delivery facilities associated with two of consultant/GMP/midwife ward
concept.definition: In NHS hospital - delivery facilities associated with consultant/GMP/midwife ward inclusive of any combination of two of the professionals mentioned

concept.display: In NHS hospital - ward or unit without delivery facilities
